channel.title: Comments on: Which should i go for platinum next? Finished all of the main stories.

item.title: By: scissor89
item.dc:creator: scissor89
item.description: Gta 5 is a looooooong quest to get platinum! Start with horizon
item.content:encoded:
Gta 5 is a looooooong quest to get platinum!
Start with horizon

item.title: By: Tormund_Redhair
item.dc:creator: Tormund_Redhair
item.description: Horizon is a great one to plat. It doesnâ€™t take a lot of effort and Forbidden West will come soon, so a great moment to dive into the game again.
item.content:encoded: Horizon is a great one to plat. It doesnâ€™t take a lot of effort and Forbidden West will come soon, so a great moment to dive into the game again.

item.title: By: AggressiveBaby
item.dc:creator: AggressiveBaby
item.description: Spidey is easiest. Then Horizon. Still working on Ratchet.
item.content:encoded: Spidey is easiest. Then Horizon. Still working on Ratchet.

item.title: By: RetroRedneck
item.dc:creator: RetroRedneck
item.description: Ratchet and Clank gets my vote

item.title: By: LT_Snaker
item.dc:creator: LT_Snaker
item.description:
GTAV is incredibly grindy. Requires 100% for single player and high levels reached in MP.
Spider-Man can be a bit grindy as it requires a lot of collectibles and all crimes finished.
Horizon is a long one but I really had fun with that one.
Ratchet is also grindy, as it requires all weapon upgrades, bolts, etc.
If it were me, I'd go for Spider-Man and Horizon.
item.content:encoded:
GTAV is incredibly grindy. Requires 100% for single player and high levels reached in MP.

Spider-Man can be a bit grindy as it requires a lot of collectibles and all crimes finished.

Horizon is a long one but I really had fun with that one.

Ratchet is also grindy, as it requires all weapon upgrades, bolts, etc.

If it were me, I’d go for Spider-Man and Horizon.

item.title: By: denimpanzer
item.dc:creator: denimpanzer
item.description: Spider-Man is grindy but IIRC not difficult and you probably did a lot of it on the way to campaign completion.
item.content:encoded: Spider-Man is grindy but IIRC not difficult and you probably did a lot of it on the way to campaign completion.

item.title: By: TheGelada
item.dc:creator: TheGelada
item.description: Iâ€™d go with either R&C or Spidey for now. When you finish one of those then jump into HZD and then you will be primed for Forbidden West in Feb!!
item.content:encoded: Iâ€™d go with either R&C or Spidey for now. When you finish one of those then jump into HZD and then you will be primed for Forbidden West in Feb!!

item.title: By: jo_vesx
item.dc:creator: jo_vesx
item.description: Definitely Horizon! Itâ€™s not difficult and itâ€™s very entertaining. I loved getting the platinum for HZD, it never bored me and it was an amazing experience :)
